unnormalised: SpiceJet flight SG 406 from Delhi to Mumbai was delayed by 3 hrs today, originally scheduled to depart at 6:00 AM but now expected to take off at 9:00 AM. Passengers are requested to check flight status for further updates. The revised arrival time in Mumbai is estimated to be around 11:30 AM instead of the original 8:30 AM.
normalised: SpiceJet flight S-G four hundred and six from Delhi to Mumbai was delayed by three hours today, originally scheduled to depart at six zero zero A-M but now expected to take off at nine zero zero A-M. Passengers are requested to check flight status for further updates. The revised arrival time in Mumbai is estimated to be around eleven thirty A-M instead of the original eight thirty A-M.

unnormalised: Railway authorities have also announced changes to the timings of the Rajdhani Express. Train no. 12301, the Howrah Rajdhani, will now arrive in Delhi at 10:00 AM instead of 9:30 AM due to operational delays. Passengers can expect a 30-minute delay.
normalised: Railway authorities have also announced changes to the timings of the Rajdhani Express. Train number one two three zero one, the Howrah Rajdhani, will now arrive in Delhi at ten zero zero A-M instead of nine thirty A-M due to operational delays. Passengers can expect a thirty minute delay.

unnormalised: Local bus services in Chennai have also been affected due to the ongoing monsoon. The MTC bus route 27B, which usually runs every 15 mins, is experiencing delays of up to 45 mins. Commuters are advised to plan their travel accordingly.
normalised: Local bus services in Chennai have also been affected due to the ongoing monsoon. The M-T-C bus route twenty seven B, which usually runs every fifteen minutes, is experiencing delays of up to forty five minutes. Commuters are advised to plan their travel accordingly.

unnormalised: Passengers traveling via the Yamuna Expressway should note that toll booths are experiencing longer wait times, especially between 7:00 AM and 9:00 AM. Consider using FASTag or alternate routes if possible.
normalised: Passengers traveling via the Yamuna Expressway should note that toll booths are experiencing longer wait times, especially between seven zero zero A-M and nine zero zero A-M. Consider using F-A-S-T-ag or alternate routes if possible.
